227e106b-ea79-41f2-80aa-732fe8d664b2: A black, frothy liquid collected from the veins of a demon after it is subjected to a procedure for magical preservation. Objects tempered in this liquid gain distinct magical properties.
f42bb574-aaa6-46cb-863f-114a96701208: A hide skinned from a magical creature. As it retains some of its magical properties, such material is greatly valued by artisans who craft charmed items.
bc49e9e6-9cbd-4603-a3ab-7ca0dc23e78e: An essence obtained through painstaking distillation of rare magical ingredients. An expensive and valuable substance, sought after by craftsmen and wizards who create magical items.
695246a0-609f-43ba-9002-40920c53d48e: Special metal extracted from the depths and forged at a low temperature. Cold iron is not only useful for making weapons against demons and fey, but is also a valuable alchemical reagent.
a069e9ec-8f4a-4ae4-b6f3-acfa9a99fe6b: This is a cooking ingredient. You can use it to cook something while {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}resting{/g}.
d093a3ff-3281-4371-a917-0eba3499afff: This kit allows you to create potions of 1 level {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.
59f6deb7-84ee-4bb8-8d8d-cd4126dbf953: This kit allows you to create potions of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} up to 2 level.
4ad2073c-0463-4305-93c7-52d4bf1ad3f2: This kit allows you to create potions of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} up to 3 level.
ff435440-1c3c-4452-9b6a-1d71cdd4035f: This kit allows you to create potions of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} up to 4 level.
f2051e88-4a87-4fbd-934f-70118471655c: This kit allows you to create potions of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} up to 5 level.
eb9b82ef-b0a5-4826-b97f-20e9c9504477: This kit allows you to create potions of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} up to 6 level.
895f70e9-ab77-4410-8dc1-1f4965d546df: This kit allows you to create scrolls of 1 level {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.
a5ae5409-4874-4970-9309-d2bd1af32213: This kit allows you to create scrolls of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} up to 2 level.
16b1268e-4b4e-4aa8-a23f-ae5f5edd2272: This kit allows you to create scrolls of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} up to 3 level.
5cb9bb6e-8b87-4287-b100-2f0712bbd066: This kit allows you to create scrolls of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} up to 4 level.
a81e41f6-7af7-401d-99f2-b44a5726324a: This kit allows you to create scrolls of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} up to 5 level.
e6c56ceb-1d9b-4ff2-a477-b44b252d648d: This kit allows you to create scrolls of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} up to 6 level.
efcb15be-a3bd-4b85-b530-d0c8063b8d87: This kit allows you to create scrolls of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} up to 7 level.
ba75b262-3783-4336-8d9b-86407610687c: This kit allows you to create scrolls of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} up to 8 level.
91a32809-e325-486b-9812-6dafb7871e6f: This kit allows you to create scrolls of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} up to 9 level.
ac52d002-af16-4750-98f0-285cfa8d9d94: This magical substance is necessary to clean and safely consume any food in the corrupted wastelands of the Worldwound.
77482964-17e5-450f-a1b9-e25d36ea87f1: This reagent can be used to brew potions or scribe scrolls.
